title: 820-3115 shutdown when got descktop
message:
This board has liquide damage and burnt coil and damage lvds. I replaced the lvds and bridg the coil that goes to pin3 (lvds) next to the lvds.
Now the problem is when the board got to the desktop, board shut down. Any idea where to check next? Already tried with usb hard drive.

title: 820-3115 shutdown when got descktop
message: Could be corrosion anywhere, can't help with that.
